title: How to write a letter to a university - Quora

response.answer_text: The formal letter format is available in the word doc app available at play store. In case you want a better format. Please follow the following. To, The _______ Name of the university Address of the university Date Subject Salutation Body of the content Introduce yourself and the agenda of the letterExplain the subject in detailed format listing all detailsWhat do you need?Thanking you. Yours sincerely, Xyz Number Mail id

You had to be precise on what kind of a letter you’d want to write to the university and whom are you writing to? Letters to any organisation/Institute are usually very formal & brisk. So keep your letter simple with - SubjectIntroductionBody of the letter ( Explaining your concern)ConclusionYou must be careful while addressing professors. Also, do not write too long mails. Always attach your resume if you’re looking for a project trainee under a professor. Hope this helps :)
